name: com.metica.unity
description: Unity components to interface with the Metica offers platform.

samples.description: Contains a minimal scene and script that roughly simulate a game/app session. This example uses the familiar approach used in Metica Unity SDK prior to release 1.3.1.
Contains a minimal scene that shows how to use the new SDK call style based on async/await. This approach exists for versions above 1.3.1.
